title: Weather Application
description: The Weather App, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, provides real-time weather updates using a weather API. It features a responsive design and allows users to search for weather conditions easily.

title: Portfolio
description: Build a visually appealing, fully animated React portfolio using CSS, ensuring responsive design and modern, good-looking elements for an impressive presentation.

title: Real Time Text Editor
description: The Real-Time Text Editor, built with React.js, Node.js, and Socket.io, enables collaborative editing with live updates. It offers a seamless and responsive user experience for multiple users.
